meanings.definition: Lack of agreement or harmony; inconsistency.
meanings.sent1: The disconformities in their opinions led to a heated argument.
meanings.sent2: The disconformities between the two reports raised doubts about their accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The disconformities in their dance moves made the performance comical.
meanings.sent4: The disconformities in their schedules created a chaotic mess.
meanings.sent5: The disconformities in their singing styles were evident to everyone.

meanings.definition: A difference or variance between two things.
meanings.sent1: The disconformities in the sizes of the shoes were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: The disconformities in their preferences highlighted their unique tastes.
meanings.sent3: The disconformities in their ice cream flavors sparked a friendly debate.
meanings.sent4: The disconformities in their handwriting styles made it hard to match the notes.
meanings.sent5: The disconformities in their painting techniques set them apart as artists.

meanings.definition: A deviation from the norm or standard.
meanings.sent1: The disconformities in her behavior worried her parents.
meanings.sent2: The disconformities in the test results surprised the students.
meanings.sent3: The disconformities in his fashion choices always turned heads.
meanings.sent4: The disconformities in their approach to problem-solving were refreshing.
meanings.sent5: The disconformities in their architectural designs challenged traditional norms.
